SEARCH
Module java.base
Package jdk.internal.classfile

Interface Label

public sealed interface Label
A marker for a position within the instructions of a method body. The assocation between a label's identity and the position it represents is managed by the entity managing the method body (a CodeModel or CodeBuilder), not the label itself; this allows the same label to have a meaning both in an existing method (as managed by a CodeModel) and in the transformation of that method (as managed by a CodeBuilder), while corresponding to different positions in each. When traversing the elements of a CodeModel, Label markers will be delivered at the position to which they correspond. A label can be bound to the current position within a CodeBuilder via CodeBuilder.labelBinding(Label) or ClassfileBuilder.with(ClassfileElement).
